body_html:
@peterjc123
I'm having the same issue as @ankur6ue with the Declarations.yaml
I'm following your instructions, here is what I did and please tell me what I did wrong:

  • installed Visual Studio Community 2017
  • installed CUDA without Visual Studio integration because of error, but installed the NVTX manually after
  • added C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework64\v4.0.30319 to the Path environment variable because I got some msbuild command is not recognized error messages
  • installed Anaconda Navigator, created a new environment with those packages in your guide and opened it in a terminal
  • git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
  • cd pytorch
  • xcopy /Y aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py
  • set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64 - because I have CUDA 9 installed
  • python setup.py install

And then I got some of these errors because of the msbuild:
Sorry, it's not in english :( Basically it says that it couldn't find the C:\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props file.
C:\Users\Alex\qwe\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\INSTALL.vcxproj(29,3): error MSB4019: Az importált "C:\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props" projekt nem található. Győződjön meg az <Import> deklarációban szereplő elérési út helyességéről, és arról, hogy a fájl megtalálható a lemezen.

The cause is this line in pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\INSTALL.vcxproj:
<Import Project="$(VCTargetsPath)\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props" />

And when I set the VCTargetsPath variable manually I get similar errors to other files.

And I get this error too at the end:
error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'torch/lib/tmp_install/share/ATen/Declarations.yaml'

@peterjc123
I'm having the same issue as @ankur6ue with the Declarations.yaml
I'm following your instructions, here is what I did and please tell me what I did wrong:

installed Visual Studio Community 2017
installed CUDA without Visual Studio integration because of error, but installed the NVTX manually after
added C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework64\v4.0.30319 to the Path environment variable because I got some msbuild command is not recognized error messages
installed Anaconda Navigator, created a new environment with those packages in your guide and opened it in a terminal
git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
cd pytorch
xcopy /Y aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64 - because I have CUDA 9 installed
python setup.py install

And then I got some of these errors because of the msbuild:
Sorry, it's not in english :( Basically it says that it couldn't find the C:\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props file.

The cause is this line in pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\INSTALL.vcxproj:
<Import Project="$(VCTargetsPath)\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props" />
And when I set the VCTargetsPath variable manually I get similar errors to other files.
And I get this error too at the end:

body:
@peterjc123 
I'm having the same issue as @ankur6ue with the Declarations.yaml
I'm following your instructions, here is what I did and please tell me what I did wrong:

 - installed Visual Studio Community 2017
 - installed CUDA without Visual Studio integration because of error, but installed the NVTX manually after
 - added `C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework64\v4.0.30319` to the Path environment variable because I got some msbuild command is not recognized error messages
 - installed Anaconda Navigator, created a new environment with those packages in your guide and opened it in a terminal
 - `git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch`
 - `cd pytorch`
 - `xcopy /Y aten\src\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py tools\shared\cwrap_common.py`
 - `set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64` - because I have CUDA 9 installed
 - `python setup.py install`

And then I got some of these errors because of the msbuild:
Sorry, it's not in english :( Basically it says that it couldn't find the `C:\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props` file.
`C:\Users\Alex\qwe\pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\INSTALL.vcxproj(29,3): error MSB4019: Az importált "C:\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props" projekt nem található. Győződjön meg az <Import> deklarációban szereplő elérési út helyességéről, és arról, hogy a fájl megtalálható a lemezen.`

The cause is this line in `pytorch\torch\lib\build\ATen\INSTALL.vcxproj`:
`<Import Project="$(VCTargetsPath)\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props" />`

And when I set the `VCTargetsPath` variable manually I get similar errors to other files.

And I get this error too at the end:
`error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'torch/lib/tmp_install/share/ATen/Declarations.yaml'`
